blueprint.description:
Connect storage to green wire on the medium pole.
 - Optionally, the red wire has the requested item, to set inserter filters
Connect red wire on the big pole to the train network.

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Negates storage and adds to request

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Adds (train load - 1) to round up requests

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Counts train loads required to fulfill request.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Memory cell for the station's ID.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Gets the highest station ID on the network (+1 from the constant combinator) to store in the memory cell as its own ID.

entities.name: constant-combinator
entities.player_description:
Item = Item and how much to request. You cannot change the item to request here, restamp the BP to do so.
I = # of the item that can fit in a train load
L = Max train limit

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Converts train limit to parameter for calculations.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Counteract the decrease in request for on the way trains if a train is at the station, as the train inventory is added to the storage, accounting for this already.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Output the lower of the max train limit and the requested trains.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Output the lower of the max train limit and the requested trains.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Only request positive trains. Prevents overloading this station from counteracting a request for the same item from another station.

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Decrease request for every train currently on the way to prevent too many from being dispatched. This is done on the provider stations aswell.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Only dispatch trains when it is this station's turn (unless it takes more than 5 seconds).

blueprint.label: Item Requester

blueprint.description:
Connect storage to green wire on the medium pole.
 - optionally, the red wire has the requested item, to set inserter filters
Connect red wire on big pole to the train network.

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Negates storage and adds to request

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Counts train loads required to fulfill request.

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Adds (train load - 1) to round up requests

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Memory cell for the station's ID.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Gets the highest station ID on the network (+1 from the constant combinator) to store in the memory cell as its own ID.

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Converts train limit to parameter for calculations.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Counteract the decrease in request for on the way trains if a train is at the station, as the train inventory is added to the storage, accounting for this already.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Output the lower of the max train limit and the requested trains.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Output the lower of the max train limit and the requested trains.

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Decrease request for every train currently on the way to prevent too many from being dispatched. This is done on the provider stations aswell.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Only request positive trains. Prevents overloading this station from counteracting a request for the same item from another station.

entities.player_description: Only dispatch trains when it is this station's turn (unless it takes more than 5 seconds).

blueprint.label: Fluid Requester

blueprint.description:
Connect storage to red wire on the medium pole
Connect red wire on big pole to the train network

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Counts train loads able to be fulfilled by this provider.

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Converts train limit to parameter for calculations.

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Decrease request for every train currently on the way to prevent too many from being dispatched. This is done on the requester stations aswell.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Output the lower of the max train limit and the trains able to be provided for.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Output the lower of the max train limit and the trains able to be provided for.

entities.name: decider-combinator
entities.player_description: Accounts for the currently stationed train and what it will need to fill. This combines with the output from the train stop to get the items still required to fill the train.

entities.name: arithmetic-combinator
entities.player_description: Converts train load for use with the train at the station.

entities.name: constant-combinator
entities.player_description:
Item = Item and the minimum amount for the station to have before allowing a train to dispatch. You cannot change the item to request here, restamp the BP to do so.
I = # of the item that can fit in a train load
L = Max train limit
